body:
Hi Mostapha

I have openfoam installed on win7 (after trying without success to work on win10 - maybe because you use openfoam v3.1 and not the latest v1606?)

After trying to play with the butterfly "beta" - I think I got most of your script working, except the visualization.

I think the problem is that i have about 78K points and only about 1500 vectors. 

thanks
